alert.note: Alert for Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:18PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McMullen and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1018 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Simmons, or 10 miles south of Choke Canyon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Simmons. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 636 and 638. US Highway 59 between mile markers 726 and 736. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
